main event: A witness observed a stationary object described as long like a cigar with a round section underneath it in Van Wert, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was black in color and did not move during the observation., The observation lasted for 5 minutes while the witness was driving through town., The object disappeared behind a building while being observed., The report concluded that it could be a cloud or contrail., There is no physical evidence or photographs of the sighting.
sighted object: One long cigar-shaped object with a round section underneath
